detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract HCurve (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve__1.sol#586-652) has payable functions:
	 - HandlerBase.postProcess() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve__1.sol#161-172)
	 - HCurve.exchange(address,int256,int256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve__1.sol#592-605)
	 - HCurve.exchangeUnderlying(address,int256,int256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve__1.sol#608-627)
	 - HCurve.swap(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256[],uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve__1.sol#630-651)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
